page.title: 18THE LOCAL PAPER_SKELMERSDALE
page.content: Our area has its own local newspaper called The Skelmersdale Advertiser. It is published weekly and costs 20p to buy.This is good value because it is full of local news and contains a lot of features and adverts. The paper usually has about 30 pages. The front page always has stories which are important to people in the town.Inside you will find all kinds of interesting pages.There are Family Announcements,Entertainment Guides, Letters,Crosswords and Local Features. There are a lot of Adverts for House Sales ,Used Cars and Articles for Sale.The paper also contains photograghs of local events and sports teams and so on.Many households seem to buy the paper each week.The circulation in the town is about 5000 copies per week.
